actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title IV-D of the Social Security Act to authorize Federal financial participation in court expenses attributable to the performance of services directly related to the operation of a State plan for child support established pursuant to such title.

summary.text: Amends part D (Child support and Establishment of Paternity) of title IV of the Social Security Act to include in the expenditures of a State under part D court expenditures attributable to the performance of services related to the operation of part D.

titles.title: A bill to amend title IV-D of the Social Security Act to authorize Federal financial participation in court expenses attributable to the performance of services directly related to the operation of a State plan for child support established pursuant to such title.
